OOC: For those of you who are still puzzled, the wave that has hit the 
trio was the very same that was emitted by the false moon in Beast 
Wars Season and that changed the transformers... Now on a piloted 
mech... hehehe!

Bic: Hurled throughout nearly a thousand light years from Strana 
Mechty to the wave's point of origin, the warship exploded, killing 
the many crewsman aboard. In space, however, the three mechs seemed to 
melt... At least, they were shrinking. The seven meter-tall Solitaire 
became seven feet tall, the twelve meter Timber Wolf reduced to twelve 
feet and the Dire Wolf stopped now at fifteen feet. Then, amazingly, 
it seemed the machines were screaming. In orbit of the earth, they all 
fell in, protected by the debris of the ship.

As Katya's and Ragnar's mechs fell down in the waters of the bay 
between Maximal and Predacon bases, Vlad came down at the southern 
edge of the southern continent, in a temperate forest.
